reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My boyfriend and I were looking to rekindle our relationship, bring back the love, so we chose a vacation at a Sandal's where we would not have to worry about a thing, except how long to stay in the sun. We chose Antigua because neither of us had ever been there before and we had such a romantic time. The staff here was FABULOUS, anything and everything you asked for they gave with a smile. The room was neat, clean and very comfortable. The sand was white, the water was turquise and the atmosphere was relaxing. Plenty to do and see. We loved it so much we are thinking of having our wedding there! Highly recomended for the laid back up for anything kind of couple.
reviews.title: Brought the Love Back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our third year at Sandals Antigua, and even before leaving to start our trip this year we booked 2008. The staff is better than excellent. Most staff remembers returning guests by name, by your food and drink likes and dislikes, and by what activities you like doing. I am a diver, and the dive equipment, boat and staff are all top quality. I took the PADI Rescue Diver course at Sandals this year. Their staff will give you the one on one classes of your choosing. Every one who works at Sandals Antigua seems to have as good a time as the guests...Enjoy!!
reviews.title: three times a gem

reviews.text: Our experience with Sandals has been consistently positive and successful. When we have encountered problems, we have found the Sandals staff to be responsive and considerate.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2005
reviews.text: I just returned from Antigua. We were there from 2005/11/26 till 2005/12/03. We loved it. Before we left we read all the bad reviews and almost changed. We are so glad we didn't. Our room was great, we stayed in 810. This is not the highest room either. You will here about bug bites. We took bug spray with us with deet in it and my wife and I sat on the beach all day for a week and we may have 2 or 3 each. They are bad near sundown but you just spray and enjoy the beautiful sunset. Where do i start. You will here people talking about cats. There are about 7 or 8 and a couple are kittens. They are the cleanest cats I have ever seen. They mind their own business. I saw one dog on the beach. If you want to buy a necklace on the beach. Ask for Darren. He usually sits down near the 700 block on the beach. He is homeless and does a great job.
reviews.title: Don't Listen to The Bad Reviews

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2005
reviews.text: Having stayed at 5 other Sandals resorts I would have to agree with some of the negative comments. For us, this Sandals was by far in need of help. We also had the Honeymoon Suite, which frankly was "falling apart" literally... We asked for a room change and after 2 hours of waiting was granted a two room category downgrade. According to them, our only other option was for us to go fly to St. Lucia.(not exactly an option because we were with other couples). Having stayed at the other Sandals we have come to have an idea as to what Sandals is all about, but didn't find much of it here. During our visit, Playmakers were pretty much non existant, gym classes were cancelled due to the instructor being away (no replacement), half of the cardio machines in the gym were also broken.. They cannot control mother nature, but at past resorts when it rained the playmakers came up with activites to do!! One day it rained for the entire day, nothing was going on...people just milling around looking for something to do, so we went to the playmakers office and they said "activites had be cancelled" they were all sitting around in the office hanging out together, having their own good time. Come on lets get something going!
reviews.title: Not up to Sandals Par

reviews.text: As previously mentioned on this website, we were greeted with cool towels and sparkling wine. These little extras were much appreciated and needed after our ordeal at the airport. We were very delighted with our Luxury Oceanview Beachfront room in the Frangipani Block. It was located far away from the construction zone on the other side of the resort. In our opinion, the Frangipani Block (Block 13) is the most secluded and also the most convenient block of rooms to stay in. We could just walk out of our room to the beach and the dining areas were situated very close by- although we could not hear any noise from the main area of the resort.

reviews.text: We reallyy enjoyed our stay. They have an excellent Dive Staff. Massage Therapists were awesome and accomodating (especially since the spa was under renovations). Would have appreciated more seafood/fish on the Dining Menus; however, you must eat at Kimonos and request "Sugar" - he's the best! One of the event coordinators "JC" was awesome. She was always around and helpful. My only complaint was that the ocean water was not even clear enough for snorkeling (which we had expected to do morning snorkels); however, taking the boat out for dives fixed that (for the water is crystal clear on other sides of the island). We will be using our vacation this year to visit Sandals again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I recently returned from our 2-week honeymoon at Sandals Grande Antigua. We had such a fantastic time at this wonderful resort on this beautiful island. While we were in Antigua we took multiple tours/excursions through Island Routes, and were very pleased with all of them, though they were a little costly. The service at Sandals was exactly as advertised; the employees were all friendly, courteous, and helpful. The property is well-maintained and very clean. We did have an issue with some ants in the bathroom of our suite, but when we brought it to the attention of the concierge, they began spraying daily (after offering us a different room, but the view was too fantastic to leave) and we did not see the ants again. The little black birds who frequent the breakfast buffet at Bayside were a little bit difficult to deal with, but we soon discovered that Mario's had the same breakfast options and was indoors. The highlight of our trip was definitely the work of the Entertainment Department. Emmanuel, Kevin, Shaunte, Shanice, MoJo, and Jacquay made our stay at Sandals so much fun! The daily activities like pool volleyball, movie trivia, flip cup, and beer pong helped us to meet other honeymoon couples who we later hung out with quite often. The nightly entertainment gave us something to do after dinner; my favorite was the movies by the fire pits on Friday nights! We had such a good time that we are already booked for the new resort in Grenada! We had never been to an all-inclusive before, and were delighted with the strong drinks and delicious food-definitely worth the price!
reviews.title: Fantastic!
